skins.shipDescription: Rejoice, Commander! For you have gained an indomitable ally in Littorio, but more importantly... let's put a smile on that cute face of yours.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Littorio, Vittorio Veneto-class battleship number two; the Mediterranean's mightiest battleship. During the war, I strutted about the ocean as if it was my garden, and that shall not change even now. Now, let us strike fear into the hearts of our enemies, Commander!
skins.acquisition: Rejoice, Commander! For you have gained an indomitable ally in Littorio, but more importantly... let's put a smile on that cute face of yours.
skins.login: Waiting is tedious, but waiting for you is anything but, Commander.
skins.details: That Veneto, she's not half bad for a fleet flagship... However, if she wants to move forward, she must learn from me. Hahahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle1: There are two kinds of people in the world: those who are Littorio, and those who are not.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Isn't it lamentable, Commander? There are so many places in the world that yearn for light, but there is but one Littorio.
skins.secretaryIdle3: There is no denying that, though battleships once ruled the seas, aircraft have ushered in the beginning of a new era. This is a fact that not even I can refute.
skins.secretaryTouch: Chasing after others is a novel and interesting experience, is it not?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, it's understandable that you would fall for me... but... this is not the time nor place for debauchery.

skins.shipDescription: A visit to the beach with me? Then you must try your hardest to stand out. Otherwise the eyes of the world will be on me alone.
skins.acquisition: A visit to the beach with me? Then you must try your hardest to stand out. Otherwise the eyes of the world will be on me alone.
skins.login: I see you've returned, Commander. Hmph, today my glory shines brighter than even the sun.
skins.details: Veneto? Don't expect much from her... No, I don't mean her swimsuit. She's the type that would spend the entire day building a sand Colosseum.
skins.secretaryIdle1: There are two kinds of people in the world: those who are bewitched by Littorio's swimsuit, and those who are not. Which one are you, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The Mediterranean Sea is thing of beauty in summer, but this sea surpasses it in sheer bustle. I prefer this one; it lets my glamor reach the hearts and minds of many more.
skins.secretaryIdle3: What? That damned Veneto is going to play beach volleyball?! ... I must help her, to ensure the Sardegna Empire's glory remains unsullied...
skins.secretaryTouch: Donning swimwear to display one's glamor for all to see C isn't it fantastic, Commander?

skins.shipDescription: Welcome to Littorio's personal suite. Are you here to issue me a challenge of who can romance the most girls? Hahahah, I'm joking of course! There'd be no fun in a game I would win every single time.
skins.acquisition: Welcome to Littorio's personal suite. Are you here to issue me a challenge of who can romance the most girls? Hahahah, I'm joking of course! There'd be no fun in a game I would win every single time.
skins.login: None but you are permitted to keep me waiting, Commander.
skins.details: As proud as we are of our wonderful Sardegnian thermae, and as befittingly charming it is when Veneto conducts foreign relations from them, the fact remains that diplomacy should be left to the pros. Wouldn't you agree?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Now, who will be the lucky recipient of Littorio's rose this time? Oh, but of course, Commander. If you want it, maybe you'll get it?
skins.secretaryIdle2: There are two kinds of parties in the world: those with Littorio in attendance, and those without.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I personally picked out all the various furnishings in here. It is no exaggeration to call this suite "La Littorio" itself. How do you like the sound of that, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: To be frank, I've been to so many parties that I've grown a bit tired of them. Let's do something interesting for a change, shall we, Commander?
